turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hello, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I need to make an order for Bella Luna pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: We got to get three pizzas, and they all should be mediums. Yeah, we can get the one taco pizza, one veggie lover's pizza, and you can make one.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and how hot do you want your taco pizza?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, like a medium. You do a medium.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, let me confirm your order with you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: 3 medium gluten free pizzas, one taco pizza, medium spiciness, one veggie lovers, and one anchovy pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: will you be dining-in, picking up, or having your order delivered?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Should be for a pick up.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your total will be $57, is that ok?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, your pizzas will be ready for pickup in 25 minutes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your receipt will be texted to you, just show it at the counter.
